string-array.name: OverseerRules
string-array.item: Your role is to guide your people to the targeted areas to collect resources
Be careful thought, if all the runners are caught by zombies, you will lose

string-array.name: PsychicRules
string-array.item: Your role is to guide your zombies to the survivors in order to eat them
Be careful thought, if the survivors get enough resources, they will got back in their HQ and you will lose

string-array.name: ZombieRules
string-array.item: Your role is to follow the psychic order to catch all the survivors
Be careful thought, if the survivors get enough resources, they will got back in their HQ and you will lose

string-array.name: SurvivorRules
string-array.item: Your role is to follow the overseer instructions to find resources
Be careful thought, if all the runners are caught by zombies, you will lose
